AbstractListBox::SmoothScrollInfo

class AbstractListBox

Detailed Description

Contains information about smooth scrolling and can be retrieved by derived classes by invoking AbstractListBox::GetSmoothScrollInfo. Usually it is not necessary to care about this information, but might be useful if additional components must be coordinated with the smooth scrolling.

Member Function Documentation

XYDIM AbstractListBox::SmoothScrollInfo::GetDiff (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the current difference in pixels of the original placement in comparison to the smooth scrolled placement. The value is always smaller than the height/width of a cell.

XYDIM AbstractListBox::SmoothScrollInfo::GetInc (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the increment which is added when the scroll timer expires.

const Timer& AbstractListBox::SmoothScrollInfo::GetTimer (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the timer which triggers the smooth scrolling.

BOOLEAN AbstractListBox::SmoothScrollInfo::IsSelector (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns TRUE, if the selector is scrolled smoothly. Otherwise the whole content will be scrolled.
